data.name: Gorgeous Modern Flat in Northern Paris - 2BR/6P
reviews: Location ₪4,412 ₪3,149 Show price breakdown for 5 nights New Reserve Entire rental unit in Paris, France 6 guests · · 2 bedrooms · · 3 beds · · 2 baths New listing New · 1 review Hosted by Amelie & Benoit Superhost · · 10 months hosting Listing highlights Amelie & Benoit is a Superhost Superhosts are experienced, highly rated Hosts. Some info has been automatically translated. Show original A comfortable, modern, and spacious apartment located in the heart of one of Paris’s most vibrant neighborhoods, the 18th arrondissement. This 45sqm ground-floor apartment opens onto a quiet courtyard and offers a bright living room with a sofa bed, a fully equipped kitchen, and two bedrooms with (one of which has its own private shower and sink). There is also a separate bathroom with a shower and toilet. The space This modern and thoughtfully furnished 2-bedroom apartment is ideal for families or friends eager to discover the real Paris. Set in a lively, authentic neighborhood in the 18th arrondissement, the apartment is well-connected by metro, offering quick access to Montmartre, Pigalle (Moulin Rouge) and central Paris Inside, you’ll find all the essentials for a relaxing and enjoyable stay in this 45sqm apartment located on on the ground floor facing a calm and peaceful garden : - A modern living room with a comfortable convertible couch with soft linens for a restful night’s sleep - A practical kitchen equipped with a stovetop, microwave, dishwasher, washing machine fridge, coffee machine, kettle, and cooking essentials : perfect for preparing light meals to enjoy in the dining area. - A comfortable bedroom with a double-size bed and flat screen TV if you want to enjoy a movie in bed. - A second bedroom with a queen-sized bed and open shower and sink. - A private bathroom with a shower, toilet, fresh towels, and complimentary toiletries - Fast Wi-Fi, AC, heating, and thoughtful details designed to make you feel at home Step outside and enjoy the charm of a true Parisian neighborhood, with bakeries, cafés, and local markets just steps away. Whether you’re visiting for a romantic escape, a work trip, or a solo adventure, this studio offers the perfect mix of comfort, convenience, and local character. Guest access You will have access to the entire apartment just for yourselves to feel at home Registration Details 7511816062294 Show more Where you’ll sleep 1 of 2 pages 1 / 2 Bedroom 1 1 double bed Bedroom 2 1 queen bed Living room 1 sofa bed
